attributes.action: Legalise use of cannabis to help country economy
attributes.additional_details: Greater good for our nation increase finance in all sectors save a lot of police time and funding of destruction of such produce
attributes.background: Country is in economic crisis youths are unemployed government is loosing out on millions yearly which can be pumped into commercial sectors increase vehicle tax and driving test prices to decrease drivers on road extra driving test for users at a none discriminatory due usage

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Reassess the classification of Cannabis and decriminalize it
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700385
